text: I drank this at work today for a boost of energy, which it provided, but as far as flavor, it was good but not excellent. It doesn't stand out to me anymore than any of the other cold coffee drinks I have purchased, including Starbucks and Seattle's Best. I have recently been purchasing the generic brand at our Aldi grocery store to save money and it's just as good as any of the brand name ones. So, I would drink this again, but I wouldn't make an effort to purchase this brand. I'm happy with any cold coffee drink, and purchase according to price.
